The goal of this workshop is to equip participants with the ability to recognize and produce data visualizations in accordance with the best practices of the field. Looking forward to meeting you all!

## Venue

The workshop takes place at the **Kigali Marriott Hotel in Kigali, Rwanda on April 19th 2024**. We will begin at 9:30am and finish at 1pm (see schedule below). If you have had any trouble with software installation, **please arrive 15 minutes prior to the beginning of the session** so we can assist you.

## Before the Workshop

Please try to have these installed before the training, if you have any trouble installing we will have a station on 18th April where you can come for assistance (The steps might take approximately 15 minutes).

a.  [Install R](https://gloriasalome20.github.io/Principles-and-Practice-of-Data-Visualization-in-R/Getting_started_with_R.html#installing-r)

b.  [Install and Setup RStudio Desktop](https://gloriasalome20.github.io/Principles-and-Practice-of-Data-Visualization-in-R/Getting_started_with_R.html#install-and-setup-rstudio-desktop)

c.  [Install Libraries](https://gloriasalome20.github.io/Principles-and-Practice-of-Data-Visualization-in-R/Getting_started_with_R.html#installing-r-packages)

::: callout-tip
### Note

-   All software used in this workshop is free.
-   If you have any difficulties with the installation, support can be provided on the first day of the AMMnet meeting, before the session, during breaks.
:::
